name: Xvfb
description: Manage Xvfb and configure Linux agents to run UI tests
author: torrentalle

inputs.name: action
inputs.label: Action
inputs.helpMarkDown:
The action to execute with Xvfb.

Start: the X server will be available by folowwing tasks.

Run: execute specified command using xvfb-run

inputs.name: screenSize
inputs.label: Virtual Screen Size
inputs.helpMarkDown: Sets width, height, and depth to W, H, and D respectively. By default has the dimensions 1280x1024x8

inputs.name: command
inputs.label: Command and arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Custom command to run using xvfb-run

inputs.name: exportDisplay
inputs.label: Set default DISPLAY
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set default DISPLAY for subsequent steps belong to the same wrapper task

inputs.name: extraArguments
inputs.label: Arguments to pass to Xvfb or xvfb-run
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Custom arguments to pass to executed commands.

Wrong parameters could break task execution
